channel.title: NeoVis examples on GDPR Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in NeoVis examples on GDPR Patterns

item.title: 4-graphs
item.description:
Here are multiple queries of cypher MATCH (a)-[to]-(b) with different values of Limit showing 5 0 nodes 0 edges neo = null $("#limit_5").height(200); $("#limit_5").width( ); $(function() { options = { cypher : "
 MATCH (a)-[to]-(b)
 return * Limit 5
 " , id : "limit_5" , layout : "" } neo = new neo4j_Util(); neo.draw(options) .then(function(){ if (neo.viz._network) { neo.viz._network.once('stabilized', function () { if (window.afterLoad) { window.

item.title: Example - Animate
item.description: Here is an example of animating nodes movements. .card { margin : 0px ; } #card-response { height : 100% ; } #repl { margin : 5px ; } #repl .col-10 { padding-right: 0px ; } #repl .col-2 { padding-left : 5px ; } #card-code .card-header { padding : 0px ; padding-left: 5px; } #card-code .card-actions a { padding : 0px ; } #card-code .card-actions i { color : black ; } #card-code .

item.title: Example - Canvas Draw
item.description: Here is an example of drawing directly on the canvas Note that sometimes the new nodes will only show after moving the graph .card { margin : 0px ; } #card-response { height : 100% ; } #repl { margin : 5px ; } #repl .col-10 { padding-right: 0px ; } #repl .col-2 { padding-left : 5px ; } #card-code .card-header { padding : 0px ; padding-left: 5px; } #card-code .

item.title: Example - Cluster
item.description: Here is an example of clustering nodes (click to expand) function afterLoad() { neo.cluster_By_Group('RISK') //neo.viz._network.clusterOutliers() console.log(neo.viz._network.getNodesInCluster('cidCluster')) }

item.title: Example - Hierarchical
item.description: Here is an example of using the hiearchical layout.

item.title: Run Cypher queries
item.description: write your own cypher queries return 5 return 50 return 150 Query #textarea_repl_513 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 80px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (a)-[to]-(b) return * Limit 10 Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_513() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_513').val() neo.

item.title: Run multiple cypher queries
item.description: write your own cypher queries Query #textarea_repl_822 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 80px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (a)-[to]-(b) return * Limit 10 Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_822() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_822').val() neo.run_query(cypher) } function afterLoad() { if ('yes'==='yes') run_Query_repl_822() } function get_Query_from_Url() { $.

item.title: Table - Cypher Query
item.description: Query #textarea_repl_480 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 35px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (a:RISK)-[to]-(b) RETURN a.key,type(to),b.key LIMIT 250 Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_480() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_480').val() neo.run_query(cypher) } function afterLoad() { if ('yes'==='yes') run_Query_repl_480() } function get_Query_from_Url() { $.urlParam = function (name) { var results = new RegExp('[\?

item.title: Table - Neo4j Stats
item.description: Query #textarea_repl_729 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 200px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (n) RETURN DISTINCT labels(n) As Labels, count(*) AS NumofNodes, avg(size(keys(n))) AS AvgNumOfPropPerNode, min(size(keys(n))) AS MinNumPropPerNode, max(size(keys(n))) AS MaxNumPropPerNode, avg(size((n)-[]-())) AS AvgNumOfRelationships, min(size((n)-[]-())) AS MinNumOfRelationships, max(size((n)-[]-())) AS MaxNumOfRelationships Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_729() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_729').
